Sentencas: Solid oxide fuel cells (SOFC) are complex nonlinear and time-varying systems with operational constraints.
Titulo: A novel data-driven controller for solid oxide fuel cell via deep reinforcement learning

Sentencas: How to effectively control and stabilize the output voltage while preventing constraint violations becomes a main challenge to its wide application.
Titulo: A novel data-driven controller for solid oxide fuel cell via deep reinforcement learning

Sentencas: To improve the efficiency of its operation and power tracking control and prevent constraint violations, this paper designs a data-driven adaptive proportional integral derivative (PID) controller, which maintains the output voltage at the reference value via the optimal control of the hydrogen flow.
Titulo: A novel data-driven controller for solid oxide fuel cell via deep reinforcement learning

Sentencas: Moreover, a novel large-scale deep reinforcement learning (DRL) algorithm, called the two-stage training strategy large-scale twin delayed deep determination policy gradient (TGSL-TD3PG), is adopted to adaptively adjust the baseline coefficients of the designed controller scaffolded by the high adaptability and model-free features of reinforcement learning.
Titulo: A novel data-driven controller for solid oxide fuel cell via deep reinforcement learning

Sentencas: In the training of TGSL-TD3PG, multiple agents are simultaneously employed to acquire the best policy, whereby the training of optimal agents in practice is structured upon the principles of imitation learning and curriculum learning.
Titulo: A novel data-driven controller for solid oxide fuel cell via deep reinforcement learning

Sentencas: This method solves the common problem of low robustness in conventional deep reinforcement learning and can be applied to the field of control.
Titulo: A novel data-driven controller for solid oxide fuel cell via deep reinforcement learning

Sentencas: Moreover, the TGSL-TD3PG algorithm incorporates the baseline PID coefficients into the design objective and offers the controller with the online coefficient-adjusting ability through learning.
Titulo: A novel data-driven controller for solid oxide fuel cell via deep reinforcement learning

Sentencas: Therefore, such limitations as no adaptability, low robustness and neglect of constraints associated with conventional PID control are significantly addressed.
Titulo: A novel data-driven controller for solid oxide fuel cell via deep reinforcement learning

Sentencas: Simulation results show that the proposed controller can promote the SOFC to track the load power demand effectively while maintaining the fuel utilization ratio constant.
Titulo: A novel data-driven controller for solid oxide fuel cell via deep reinforcement learning

Sentencas: The proposed algorithm reduces 45.2% of the output voltage setting time and 30% of the voltage overshoot to the maximum extent, while generating the constraint violation time of fuel utilization at 0.
Titulo: A novel data-driven controller for solid oxide fuel cell via deep reinforcement learning
